name: Jonathan Bro in: Poopwater, New Mexico
name_original: Jonathan Bro in: Poopwater, New Mexico
description:
The year is 1999. You are Jonathan Bro, star of independent action film and world-renown badass.

You are shooting your latest film in a small town in New Mexico when the locals ask you for help.

Poopwater, NM used to be a beautiful town until the New Mexico Feco-Electric plant was built. Can you fight your way through the plant's security robots to destroy the dam and restore Poopwater to its prior glory?

  • It's a Doom clone. Enjoy amazing 2.5D graphics and MASSIVE 256x256 textures.
  • Shoot glowing orbs at Big Dog robots before they trample you.
  • Randomized levels and 4 levels of difficulty for maximum action.
  • Looping high-energy drum and bass.

Made for Wizard Jam 2016.
